text:
Benton is a city in Butler County, Kansas, United States. In 2010, 880 people lived there.
History.
Benton was created in 1884. It was named after Thomas Benton Murdock, a state politician. Benton was incorporated as a city in 1908.
In 1969, part of the film "The Gypsy Moths" was shot in the Benton area.
Geography.
Benton is at (37.789302, -97.108402). Yhe United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. All of it is land.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says that there were 880 people, 325 households, and 254 families living in Benton.
Education.
Benton is a part of USD 375 Circle Public Schools.
